title: 02/22/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/22/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys return from break to recap the crazy week that happened in the NFL and the ever-changing quarterback carousel as the Colts acquire Carson Wentz, Deshaun Watson still wanting out of Houston, and more. The guys also played the “J.J. Watt game”, each giving their pick to where they think the All-Pro defensive end will land. Peter King joined the show to further break down the Wentz trade along with possible landing spots for J.J. Watt. On the NBA front, Sports Illustrated senior writer Chris Mannix joined the show to discuss what the Lakers should do with Anthony Davis sidelined, whether the Nets are NBA Finals frontrunners, and how the Charlotte Hornets behind Rookie of the Year leader LaMelo Ball are exceeding expectations

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
